"$:/plugins/Telumire/PLM/plugins/button/tab-template", "modified": "20230425012712958", "code-body": "yes" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/PLM/plugins/button/upload": { "created": "20230419102035217", "text": "\define toggle-tiddler(tiddler) <$action-setmultiplefields $tiddler=<<__tiddler__>> $fields="text disabled-text" $values="[{$tiddler$!!disabled-text}] [{$tiddler$!!text}]"/> \end \define package-plugins(plugins-filter) <$list filter=<<__plugins-filter__>> > <$importvariables filter="[[$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/tabs/content-template]]"> <$let plugin={{!!title}} pluginType={{!!plugin-draft}} namePrefix={{{ $:/[{!!plugin-draft}]s/ +[join[]] }}} pluginName={{{ [{!!title}split[/]last[]] }}} publisherName={{{ [{!!author}!match[]]~[{!!title}trimtrimtrim[/]] }}} pluginVersion={{{ [{!!version}!match[]]~0.0.0 }}} timedate=<> notEmpty="[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix!][get[extra-tiddlers]enlist-input[]] :filter[has[title]]" fileName={{{ [{!!title}split[/]last[]] "_" [] [[.json]] +[join[]] }}} > <$importvariables filter="[[$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/actions/add-plugin.info]]"> <$let plugin-title=<> currentTiddler={{{ [addsuffix[/plugin.info]] }}} > <$linkcatcher><> <$wikify name="JSON" text="<$transclude mode='block' tiddler='$:/plugins/kookma/gatha/export/json-template' />" output="text"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<> tags="plugin-upload" type="text/plain"/> \end \define send-plugins() <$list filter="[{$:/config/file-uploads/github/uploadpath}!match[plugins]]"> <> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/file-uploads/github/uploadpath" text="plugins"/> <$list filter="[{$:/GitHub/Username}is[blank]]"> <> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-upload-tiddlers" $param="[[plugin-upload]tagging[]]"/> \end \define upload-plugins(plugins-filter) <$list filter="[{$:/config/AutoSave}!is[blank]]"><> <> <> \end \define clean-up() <> <> <$action-setmultiplefields $tiddler="$:/config/file-uploads/github/uploadpath" $fields="text original-text" $values="[{$:/config/file-uploads/github/uploadpath!!original-text}][[]]" /> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[[plugin-upload]tagging[]]"/> <$wikify name="site-title" text={{$:/config/SaveWikiButton/Filename}}> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-save-wiki" $param={{$:/config/SaveWikiButton/Template}} filename=<>/> \end \define upload-button(plugins-filter,ready:"Upload plugins",wait:"Uploading.. Please wait a bit..",finish:"Upload completed. Click again to clean up the wiki.",class:"tc-btn-invisible") <$list filter="[subfilter{$:/plugins/Telumire/ReadOnly/settings!!ReadOnlyFilter}!match[true]]"> <$button class=<<__class__>> > <$list filter="[tag[plugin-upload]count[]match[0]]">$ready$ <> <$list filter="[tag[plugin-upload]has[text]limit[1]]">$wait$ <$list filter="[tag[plugin-upload]has[text]count[]match[0]]:filter[[plugin-upload]tagging[]]">$finish$<> \end", "tags": "", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/PLM/plugins/button/upload", "modified": "20230420204305860", "code-body": "yes" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/PLM/plugins/itemTemplate": { "created": "20230421135916310", "text": "\whitespace trim \define plugin-table-body(type,disabledMessage,default-popup-state)
<$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="yes" default="""$default-popup-state$"""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-dropdown"> {{$:/core/images/chevron-right}} <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="yes" default="""$default-popup-state$"""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-dropdown"> {{$:/core/images/chevron-down}}
<$transclude tiddler=<> subtiddler=<>> <$transclude tiddler={{{ [] "/icon"+[join[]] }}}>{{$:/core/images/plugin-generic-plugin}}

''<$text text={{{ [get[name]] ~[split[/]last[1]] }}}/>'': <$view field="description"><$view field="title"/> $disabledMessage$

<$view field="title"/>

<$view field="version"/>

\end <$let tv-config-toolbar-text="yes" plugin=<> popup-state=<> plugin-type={{!!plugin-type}} default-popup-state="no" tabsList="[{!!title}addsuffix[/readme]has[text]] [all[tiddlers+shadows]prefixsearch:tags[$:/tags/ControlPanel]then[settings]] contents metadata export" explicitState={{{ [] "!!tab" +[join[]] }}} default-tab={{{ [trim[!!tab]get[tab]]:else[subfilterhas[text]first[]] }}} >
<$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="yes"> <$button class="tc-plugin-info" dragFilter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix{!!title}]" set=<> setTo={{{ [get[text]toggle[yes],[no]] }}} > <$macrocall $name="plugin-table-body" type=<> default-popup-state=<> /> <$reveal type="match" text="yes" state=<> default=<> >
<$list filter="[subfilter{$:/plugins/Telumire/ReadOnly/settings!!ReadOnlyFilter}!match[true]]" variable="ignore">
<$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="yes"> <]" ready:"{{$:/plugins/commons/file-uploads/images/upload}} upload" wait:"⌛ uploading.. Please wait a bit.." finish:"🧼 upload completed. Click again to clean up the wiki.">>
<$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList=<> explicitState=<> default=<> buttonTemplate="$:/plugins/Telumire/PLM/plugins/button/tab-template" template="$:/plugins/Telumire/PLM/plugins/itemTemplate/tabs"/>

Adds a few features to the excellent [[Gatha|$:/plugins/kookma/gatha]] plugin: * Upload to GitHub button, using the [[file-uploads|$:/plugins/commons/file-uploads]] plugin * Some tweaks to the UI", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/PLM/readme", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "modified": "20230425014338893" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/PLM/style/PluginItem": { "created": "20230421182952339", "text": "button.tc-plugin-info{ text-align: left; width: 100%; }", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/PLM/style/PluginItem", "modified": "20230424134633536" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/PLM/Tools/DebugStylesheets": { "created": "20230416000448642", "text": "<$checkbox field="test" checked="true"> CSS test (slow!) <$checkbox field="shadows" checked="shadows"> shadows <$checkbox field="tiddlers" checked="tiddlers"> tiddlers <$let test={{!!test}} all={{{ [{!!tiddlers}] [{!!shadows}] :filter[!match[]]:else[[tiddlers]]+[join[+]] }}}> (<$count filter="[allsearch:tags[$:/tags/Stylesheet]]"/> <>) <$list filter="[allsearch:tags[$:/tags/Stylesheet]]"> <$list filter="[{!!title}encodeuricomponent[]]:filter[match[true]]" variable="url"> ", "tags": "", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/PLM/Tools/DebugStylesheets", "modified": "20230424154827480" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/PLM/Tools/FieldsVisibility": { "created": "20230424143809013", "text": "
    <$list filter="[fields[]]">

<$button>hide all", "tags": "", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/PLM/Tools/FieldsVisibility", "modified": "20230424154301671" }} }
